npm-rm

Remove a package

SYNOPSIS

npm rm <name>
npm uninstall <name>

DESCRIPTION

This uninstalls a package, completely removing everything npm installed on its behalf.

SEE ALSO

  • npm-prune(1)
  • npm-install(1)
  • npm-folders(5)
  • npm-config(1)
  • npm-config(7)
  • npmrc(5)

npm-uninstall — npm@1.3.8
